function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lax adherence to safety protocols leading to surge in COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus and higher risk of outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enforce strict policy decisions, increase public awareness and compliance with safety protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, smart city surveillance, mobility data tracking","People":"General population, travelers, local residents","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Slow vaccine rollout leading to low vaccination rate","Impact":"Higher susceptibility of the population to COVID-19 infection","Mitigation":"Accelerate vaccine distribution, increase vaccination centers, and improve public education on vaccine importance","Technologies":"Vaccine distribution management systems, public health communication tools","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffective data integration and sharing","Impact":"Difficulty in contact tracing and identification of high-risk areas","Mitigation":"Improve data integration systems, enhance inter-departmental data sharing, and strengthen collaboration between authorities","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, secure data sharing protocols","People":"Public health authorities, local authorities, law enforcement","Owner":"Government, public health institutions"}]}
